sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble registers a 6.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike, trading down 1.0%.
Nike is showing a gain of 2.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group, trading down 0.9%, and Coca-Cola, trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
